intents.short_response: We offer pre-trained ML models for classification, NLP, and computer vision tasks.
intents.detailed_response:
Our Machine Learning Platform Includes:

1. Pre-trained Models:
   - Text Classification
   - Named Entity Recognition (NER)
   - Sentiment Analysis
   - Image Classification
   - Object Detection

2. Model Training:
   - Custom dataset support
   - Automated hyperparameter tuning
   - Transfer learning capabilities
   - GPU acceleration

3. Deployment Options:
   - Cloud deployment (AWS, GCP, Azure)
   - On-premise deployment
   - Edge deployment
   - API endpoints

4. Frameworks Supported:
   - TensorFlow / Keras
   - PyTorch
   - Scikit-learn
   - XGBoost

5. Performance Metrics:
   - Accuracy tracking
   - Model versioning
   - A/B testing support
   - Real-time predictions

Get started: https://docs.example.com/ml

intents.short_response: Prepare your data using our data pipeline tools with automatic validation and feature engineering.
intents.detailed_response:
Data Preparation Guide:

1. Data Formats Supported:
   - CSV, JSON, Parquet
   - SQL databases
   - Image files (JPG, PNG, TIFF)
   - Audio files (WAV, MP3)

2. Preprocessing Features:
   - Missing value imputation
   - Outlier detection
   - Data normalization/scaling
   - Categorical encoding
   - Text tokenization

3. Feature Engineering:
   - Automatic feature selection
   - Feature scaling
   - Polynomial features
   - Time series features

4. Data Validation:
   - Schema validation
   - Distribution checks
   - Data quality reports
   - Anomaly detection

5. Batch Processing:
   - Large file handling
   - Parallel processing
   - Incremental updates
   - ETL pipelines

Documentation: https://docs.example.com/data-prep

intents.short_response: Monitor model performance with our dashboard and use insights to improve accuracy.
intents.detailed_response:
Model Performance Monitoring:

1. Key Metrics:
   - Accuracy, Precision, Recall, F1-Score
   - ROC-AUC Curves
   - Confusion Matrices
   - Cross-validation scores

2. Performance Dashboard:
   - Real-time metrics
   - Historical trends
   - Model comparisons
   - Alert thresholds

3. Improvement Strategies:
   - Hyperparameter tuning
   - Ensemble methods
   - Feature engineering
   - Data augmentation
   - Class balancing

4. Testing:
   - Train/validation/test splits
   - K-fold cross-validation
   - Time series CV
   - Stratified sampling

5. Deployment Readiness:
   - Production metrics
   - Load testing
   - Model versioning
   - Rollback procedures

Monitor your models: https://dashboard.example.com
